alert.note: Alert for Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued April 04 at 10:23PM MDT until April 05 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures in the mid-20s. * WHERE...Zion National Park from east of La Verkin to Springdale. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 9 AM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
